INTRO.ADVANTAGE1: Variety: In Carga Internacional we offer you just what you are looking for.
INTRO.ADVANTAGE2: Quality: We bring our products from different parts of the world to offer you the best of it.
INTRO.ADVANTAGE3: Proximity: Remember that we are always at your disposal.

CTATUBERS.TITLE: Tubers
CTATUBERS.SUBTITLE: Under a fertile soil, a healthy product

CTASPICES.TITLE: Spices
CTASPICES.SUBTITLE: Accompany your recipes with rich spices

CTABULBS.TITLE: Bulbs
CTABULBS.SUBTITLE: Exploit the chef inside you with these products

APPLE.TITLE: Apples
APPLE.CONTENT: With an apple a day, take the doctor away from your life! Take care of your heart with our juicy apples.

GRAPES.TITLE: Grapes
GRAPES.CONTENT: Always stay young with our grapes, they are loaded with antioxidants!

PEAR.TITLE: Pears
PEAR.CONTENT: All the vitamins you need to be healthy are in our delicious pears.

TANGERINE.TITLE: Tangerines
TANGERINE.CONTENT: Beauty does not have to hurt! Our tangerines help you keep your skin glowing in a delicious way.

ORANGE.TITLE: Oranges
ORANGE.CONTENT: Stay young with the delicious oranges that International Cargo brings to you from all corners of the world.

KIWI.TITLE: Kiwis
KIWI.CONTENT: With our delicious kiwis, dieting is a pleasure, always be hydrated with its delicious flavor.

NECTARINE.TITLE: Nectarines
NECTARINE.CONTENT: Are you on a diet? Make it fun! Nectarines contain 40 calories per 100 grams. Can you believe it?

PLUMS.TITLE: Plums
PLUMS.CONTENT: Did you know that a plum can improve your mood? As well as chocolate, but taking care of the line!

PEACH.TITLE: Peaches
PEACH.CONTENT: Have you seen how smooth and soft the peaches are? Eat them and see the same effect on their skin.

AVOCADO.TITLE: Avocados
AVOCADO.CONTENT: In addition to the many wonders they have for your health, they are delicious, what else do you need?

LINSEED.TITLE: Linseed
LINSEED.CONTENT: Say goodbye to the 'itis' flaxseed helps you avoid inflammation.

BARLEY.TITLE: Barley
BARLEY.CONTENT: Did you know that barley helps normalize blood sugar levels?.

SUNFLOWER.TITLE: Sunflower seeds
SUNFLOWER.CONTENT: Sunflower seeds are loaded with folic acid! Ideal for pregnancy.

BIRDSEED.TITLE: Alpiste
BIRDSEED.CONTENT: Did you know that birdseed is not just for the birds? It's ideal to speed up the metabolism maybe that's why they keep the figure.

YELLOWCORN.TITLE: Yellow corn
YELLOWCORN.CONTENT: A lot of fiber and little fat, what else could you ask for?

POPCORN.TITLE: Corn for popcorn
POPCORN.CONTENT: This is the sandwich with fewer calories. Did you know?

BEANS.TITLE: Beans
BEANS.CONTENT: A delicious food with a low glycemic index, there is no excuse not to enjoy them.

OATS.TITLE: Oats
OATS.CONTENT: A great breakfast that will help you stop piquing! Say goodbye to hunger between meals!

POTATOE.TITLE: Potatoes
POTATOE.CONTENT: There are so many ways to prepare them, and who does not fancy fried potatoes?

CINAMON.TITLE: Cinnamon
CINAMON.CONTENT: Improve your digestion and, why not, the taste of your dishes with this aromatic spice.

JAMAICAFLOWERS.TITLE: Flowers of Jamaica
JAMAICAFLOWERS.CONTENT: A natural coloring with a great taste, cleanse your body of toxins with this delicious product.

AJOS.TITLE: Garlics
AJOS.CONTENT: Maybe it will not protect you from vampires but it will definitely protect your memory, its components take care of it.

ONIONS.TITLE: Onions
ONIONS.CONTENT: That triglycerides and cholesterol are not part of your life, the onion will always keep them away.

CONTACT.WRITEUS-SMALL: Do you want information? Make a comment? Do it here, we are here to listen to you.
